trans-unit.source: Determines whether a window belongs to the current process

seg-source.mrk: Determines whether a window belongs to the current process

target.mrk: Determines whether a window belongs to the current process

trans-unit.source: Last window tested. If $hWnd = $hLastWnd, this process will immediately return True. Otherwise,

seg-source.mrk: If $hWnd = $hLastWnd, this process will immediately return True.

target.mrk: If $hWnd = $hLastWnd, this process will immediately return True.

trans-unit.source: _WinAPI_InProcess() will be called. If $hWnd is in process, $hLastWnd will be set to $hWnd on return.

seg-source.mrk: If $hWnd is in process, $hLastWnd will be set to $hWnd on return.

target.mrk: If $hWnd is in process, $hLastWnd will be set to $hWnd on return.

trans-unit.source: window to determine if it belongs to the current process, which means it can be accessed without mapping the control memory.
